Title: MacGeneration victime d’une attaque informatique
Description: MacGeneration a été récemment victime d’une attaque informatique de grande ampleur. Au cours de cette opération nous visant directement, les attaquants ont exploité une faille dans un module tiers pour pénétrer dans notre infrastructure, et accéder à notre serveur de bases de données. Image Jordan Harrison (Unsplash). Nous avons découvert cette attaque après une tentative de phishing visant nos journalistes et nos développeurs. Nous avons immédiatement mené un audit complet de nos serveurs, pris des mesures de sécurisation, et mis hors d’état de nuire les serveurs utilisés par les malandrins.

Title: Our response to the war in Ukraine | The GitHub Blog
Description: As the global response to the tragedies in Ukraine and other impacted regions continues to evolve, I wanted to share with our community an expansion of the message that I shared earlier this week with our Hubbers.

Title: How Does Perspective Work in Pictures?
Description: “So the lens has been a dominant thing for six hundred years now, and I think depictions need to get away from that, really. If you do, marvellous things can happen.”—David Hockney, 2022

Title: Eventual Consistency is a UX Nightmare
Description: Eventual Consistency can occur for a variety of reasons and there are many different wants to handle so you do not provide a poor UX.

Title: Huemint - AI color palette generator
Description: Huemint uses machine learning to create unique color schemes for your brand, website or graphic

Title: The Controversy Surrounding Hybrid Cryptography - Dhole Moments
Description: Who knew Hybrid Cryptography (which combines Post-Quantum Cryptography with Pre-Quantum Cryptography) would be controversial?
